column2: "Oh ...you. Good timing, there's something I must inquire."
"It's uh... how do I put this... has that Force named Marlu said anything about me?"
"We fought alongside each other during the final battle on the Mothership. However, we lost contact right after."
"...I see. No, it's not anything serious, just..."
"Well, it's really no big deal, but..."
"It just feels like the gap between us has widened. She seems to slip away every time I try to start a conversation."
"The problem is this attitude of mine."
"It's true that I hate forces. But I don't hate her in particular."
"I think we've had our share of misunderstandings, and I want to straighten them out."
"I just worry that it might be too late for that now."
"Sorry for wasting your time with my personal problems. I'd best be going."
"Geez! I'd never have expected this gridlock after half a year. Can you believe it!?"
"If anything, it seems it's getting worse. Why can't they be more honest with themselves?"
"All ARKS should be one big happy family! Right?"
